Review.Titre: I give 2 stars for your generosity, but...
Review.Contenu: I give 2 stars for your generosity...But the downloading is causing me some issues... Yes I have a poor internet connection, but I do know that it isn't that slow. The download just stops at any point randomly.

Review.Titre: Website Layout, Is it a SCAM?
Review.Contenu: I didn't like the over all website, seemed sketch but of course I know Thacker so I trusted it. a better layout and theme to the web site would do the trick.
Melodies and all the sounds are really good but are not unique enough fir almost every genre to fit in . There is a less variety of sounds for other genres (oyher than trap )
I have a doubt... in the product description it mentions that it weighs 1.2 gb and that it contains 458 files and I only received a 35 mb package

Review.Titre: New to it but I am also TRUE to it
Review.Contenu: By being new to producing my own sound. I went thru alot of freebies packs from a lot of folks. But I did find several different types of sounds and rhythms that are packed into along with many kinds of melodies.Thank u

My experience with bundle is to good and company is doing good but we need free sample pack that have a classical or metel piano 🎹 or sumthing like that free pack and new 8o8 s like in ,(nf the search)

The only reason that I'm rating this under a five is that there was a mistake in the first place. Somehow my account was misplaced and I lost all my purchases. However, the ripspeakers staff were extremely helpful and got me all fixed up in less then 48 hours, which is incredibly fast, and also why I'm writing this review right now. Thank you ripspeakers!
Fantastic selection of music! The rate of new loops and one shots is mind boggling! A little slow, and could use more variety but other wise 4/5!

Review.Titre: Website is well organized and delivery…
Review.Contenu: Website is well organized and delivery is problem free.  The content is of average to above average quality.  I have to learn to click on the time limite specials more quickly as I missed collecting the last freebie.  But that's on me, LOL.

Review.Titre: The way you get packs is a little weird...
Review.Contenu: The way you get packs is a little finicky and almost seems like a scam. Why would RIPSpeakers need to know my location? Otherwise, this is really great! These packs are pretty sweet, and Ill actually purchase some packs soon!
I like this sounds, especially percs. I honestly RECOMMEND all you to buy one of R.I.P Speakers packs!
Very friendly and just super communal. I love it at RIP Speakers.
Fast delivery and clear instructionsI'm satisfied

Review.Titre: there could be more free packs

Review.Contenu: I'm looking for some unique sounds. The Trilogy drum kit bundle absolutely delivered. Amazing! 🤩 These are sounds that I've never heard before in orther label.

Of one the absolute BEST companies to get loop packs/drum kits or anything related. Also the newsletter is absolutely LIT! always jammed with amazing content & useful information. Ed Talenti is a pillar of the Beatmaking community & respected/supported by hundreds of thousands across the world. Just grateful ive found his pages & was able to join his community on YouTube, Discord, Instagram Etc. & Everytime I cookup using one of his loops or drum kits. It's absolutely flames. EVERY SINGLE TIME! everything he makes personally is absolutely amazingly 🤯 mind blowing. No cap. 🧢 You'll always be thankful & satisfied with ANY & ALL purchases. Or EVEN THE FREE PACKS WILL MAKE YOU A HAPPY PRODUCTIVE PRODUCER & INSPIRED like never before. Trust. -ZDBeKuttinUp

I have purchased packs form many different companies over the past two years. Companies such as Unison, Cynmatics, WaveGrind, Function Loops and many more usually offer packs containing hundreds or even thousands of loops and samples. However, non of them beat the quality and authenticity of the small packs I recently purchased from RIP Speakers. They really value quality over quantity.

Review.Titre: Haven't got a chance to check out all…
Review.Contenu: Haven't got a chance to check out all the sounds yet but I have heard some of the sounds and they're sounding amazing working on a beat in a minute right now. to one of the samples I'll get back with you but the sounds are in there nice appreciate it thank you.

Review.Titre: The thing that made my experience great
Review.Contenu: The thing that made my experience great was the amazing sounds from the sample packs and you mite think the free sample packs are bad but there actually really good and that’s why I recommend RIP Speakers.com

I produce dark ambient music and I downloaded a bunch of sample packs from here to use in my music. I edit and distort the samples in ways that make them unrecognisable to whoever listens, these samples are perfect. I don't know if that's helpful, but I really do think these samples are pretty great, I had a blast listening to them as I made my music.

Review.Titre: Great Site for sound packs and more…!
Review.Contenu: RIP Speakers is a great site for sound packs! The creator Ed Talenti is awesome. You should definitely check out his Youtube Channel. My downloads were available instantly. Super Trustworthy site from my experience.

Review.Titre: I've been shopping at RIP Speakers…
Review.Contenu: I've been shopping at RIP Speakers since Ed Talenti launched it. The only problems I've ever had have been related to trying to use the reward coins to purchase special deals, since you have to select to use the reward coins BEFORE you can see the special deals. However, I was able to work around even that by adding an extra item to trigger the use of the coins and then removing the extra item before completing the purchase.RIP Speakers have great sounds, including some that are a bit edge-case... they might not be for everything, but in those special cases, they are perfect!

It is a good site it's got the basic stuff and those packs🤌 but you see sometimes it distorts a bit in the mobile view. I wish there were constant update on the articles like new articles, what's new, probably even links to ed's videos cause you never know which beginners might stumble upon your site. Other than that it's great and I love it and when it comes to content, packs and tutorials 🔥. I'd give it a 4.8⭐.

Listen guys i love Ed's videos and to be honest RIP speakers never dissapoints me. Always good quality. I would really recommend buying drum kits or even download all of the free once. They really helped me level up as a producer. Thank you guys!!!

Review.Titre: RIP speakers sounds are top notch
Review.Contenu: RIP speakers sounds are top notch. I feel like  I’m really using some premium sounds in my beats and the sounds also are very unique which helps spice up my beats. The products are very high quality and I would highly recommend it to any producer who wants some different unique sounds to add to their library.

Awesome website and interface. Obviously very well designed and no lag when navigating the site. Sample packs are seriously good, and even the freebies are high quality. Hats off to Ed and his team.Cheers

Very high quality, placement ready sounds for your music. Never hesitate to open a kit and use any sound from the category you want. Excellent sounds made from scratch to make your music sound clean and professional.

Review.Titre: Top of the line sound packs
Review.Contenu: Top of the line sound packs. I like how the content matches the theme it was designed around. The website is intuitive and looks cool, plus Ed Talenti makes great videos on Youtube to help with your beat making activities. I highly recommend!

Review.Titre: RIP speakers is the best website for your kits and one shots and effects
Review.Contenu: RIP speakers offers a great selection of drum kits, one shots and more. Ed (who runs and owns RIP speakers) is a great guy, and brilliant on YouTube and produces some amazing stuff. Big up RIP Speakers, the best place to buy your drum kits and effects.
Love EdTalenti's work and the @ripspeakers team. High quality products for affordable price including alot of freebies and useful resources ! one of the finest production team on earth.

Been watching EdTalenti for a while, I thought I should check out his site, and It was AMAZING!! Perfect Samples for free?!?! I've already released 2 songs with RIP Speakers. Congrats on the success, RIP Team!
RIP Speakers is my favorite sample source! Even the free downloadables are premium quality! For production I mostly use RIP drumkits, no need to look for any other drums.

Review.Titre: I just got the free packs
Review.Contenu: I just got the free packs, and they were very high quality, and i work on the mpc one, so i was happy to see how choppable some of the melodies were. On top of that the free drum pack is very good, just make sure you turn down the gain on some of those snares lol.

Review.Titre: Nice Sounds for beginners and newbies
Review.Contenu: Im just a little hobby Producer from Germany but i have to say these Sounds are amazing and the prices are reasonable. For me Personally not everything fits but i can say it was worth anyway. I got inspired in so many ways and i keep looking for new packs!

It’s a really nice site, visually pleasing and they really deliver on the thing you buy. I recommend this site to people who like to use new sounds in music production or to people who need good quality sounds for a good price!

Haven't completely listened through the RIP SPEAKERS sound packs, but if I know Ed I'm sure they're gonna be fire, As a upcoming producer who does struggle packs like this are a life saver Wether its just one shots, melodies,or drums, etc, it all helps Nice one Ed
The UI is very comfortable and easy to use, the drumkits are pretty useful and it has a wide range of sounds that new producers can easily use.

Review.Titre: RIP Speakers is the best source for…
Review.Contenu: RIP Speakers is the best source for producers on the internet if you are looking to update your samples library they are the GOATS at providing you with dope samples

I’m producing for a year now. through out the year I obviously got better and better and bought a lot of packs from all sort. I bought cheap packs and expensive ones, I bought packs that the biggest producers gave a review on it, and I bought Ed’s new pack. The melody’s, the one shots, and the drums. I NEVER IN MY LIFE MADE A BETTER PURCHASE FOR MY PRODUCING!!!Thank you Ed
You guys, always provide awesome kits, at decent prices, unique sounds, and all original!!!! I would love see Custom VST’s from you guys in the near future!

Review.Titre: Great products from a great music maker
Review.Contenu: Ed Talenti is an awesome producer, musician, and friend to the music community. His products are always top-notch, and they get better with every release. Never a disappointment.
Really great sounds overall, even the free drum kits go hard, especially earthquake so I can say I enjoyed my experience

So many times I've purchased a sound pack, to find that MOST times the only DECENT sounds are the ones they preview to you.So you end up paying big $ for a couple sounds.RIP SPEAKERS is GOD TIER.I've never scrolled through a newly purchased pack and it gets me bouncing in my seat with HYPE.

Review.Titre: I'm a new producer and my dream was…
Review.Contenu: I'm a new producer and my dream was making cool music for peoples.This site definately help me a lot u can found everthing in one place to make the perfect beat or lo-fi songs.Thanks for this work keep it going!

I really love this area because all of the sounds are really good and the person behind it, Ed, makes great content and music. In fact, Ed is the only reason I’m making music right now. So that is why I leave this site a 5/5
All the packs in the store are incredibly helpful and could help improve the overall quality of the beat, even if ur only getting the free packs it’s definitely worth a shot.
